summary: Fight a powerful foe (or recruit him) and prepare yourself for a diff. adventure to collect the artifacts he was searching for ...
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][i][b][color=#1e84cc]GRIM'S[url=#23969186] DREAM[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url][/color][/b][/i][/size]



                                                               [color=#c9daf8][size=3][i][b]([/b][/i][/size][/color][color=#c9daf8][size=3][b][i]TO SET YOU ON A LENGTHY ARTIFACT HUNT QUEST[/i][/b][/size][/color])
                                                       [color=#a4c2f4](maybe an additional purpose to continue playing this[url=#9688432] game[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] after all these years)[/color]







[size=4][b]DESCRIPTION :[/b][/size]


[size=3][b][color=#9fc5e8]Grim was an old scholar who dedicated nearly his entire life collecting information about old artifacts . Unfortunately, he died of old age before he was ever able to collect any of them. His son, Bori, decided to fulfill his father's[url=#25902752] dream[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] , and so traveled to Skyrim after preparing himself for what he anticipated would be a long and difficult journey . Hoping that he would be able to collect the artifacts his father researched, Bori wishes to open a little museum after he collects them , so he can display them in memory of his father .


Bori can be found at "Ilinalta's Deep" (see the screenshot for the location). He is a powerful wizard , He is an Imperial , with some opposite gender attitude ... you'll find on him his father's notebook with the clues to the artifacts he had researched and some other stuff (see Bori's gear bellow) .

[/color][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][color=#9fc5e8][size=3][b][color=#9fc5e8][color=#ffffff]TWO VERSIONS ARE AVAILABLE :[/color]

[color=#ffffff]Aggressive version :[/color] you'll have to fight him to get the items you need (tough fight) .
[color=#ffffff]Follower version :[/color] he is a potential follower (no fight) (a powerful follower) , you don't need any other mod to recruit
                             him . he is essential , doesn't affect stealth meter , will level with you to level 100 , good in
                             destruction alteration conjuration and restoration , will get more perks as he levels with you , can
                             be married and moves like a woman ! .  

[/color][/b][/size]This mod is standalone, but does not contain the artifacts, you will need the Artifacts of Ultima mod by DMagnus to get them: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42917/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42917/?[/url]

You will also find his notes on him, which detail his journey and the items in his possession.


[color=#ffffff][size=4]Bori's items and gear :[/size][/color]

[color=#6d9eeb]Enchanted light armor set :[/color]

He is wearing a set of light armored clothes with special enchantments that you can take for your character. They can be upgraded once you have the required perks (circlet, ring, boots, robe) .

[color=#6d9eeb]The Attra staff :[/color]

He also has a powerful staff which comes with a special conjuration enchantment that allows you to summon a special atronach named "Attra". She's more powerful than a normal fire atronach and has different attributes ... Her summon lasts 720 seconds.

[color=#6d9eeb]Slow time spell :[/color] (very useful in battle)

Bori also has a special spell tome that teaches a custom slow time spell (it's an alteration spell that lasts 7s when cast and gives you exp for its category. Beware, this spell is addictive because when you begin using it you will not be able to[url=#96943285] play[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] without it anymore) .


Many thanks for DMagnus for the permission to upload this file , he provided the nice text with the clues . I made it for myself and enjoyed the adventure and the items a lot so I decided to share .[/color]

[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/64187-1-1427579765.png[/img]
[color=#a4c2f4]The red fire sword one of Dmagnus lovely creations (from the artifacts of ultima mod mentioned above) . the sword goes on fire when you draw it ... your best friend in dark places ( illuminating your surroundings) (photo stolen from Dmagnus page) .[/color]

[color=#a4c2f4]enjoy [/color]

[/b][/size]
